ruleSearch.name: title

ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##{{book.author}}.*.接着再看更方便|本章没完.*继续阅读！如果被转码.*更换浏揽器即可。|本章未完.*退出阅读模式即可，谢谢|.*提醒.*看完记得.*|\s*温馨提示.?亲爱的读者.*\s*|\d+。。

ruleBookInfo.lastChapter:
@get:{l}
<js>
result=java.t2s(tzs(result)) 
</js>
@js:result.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##{{try{chapter.title}catch(e){java.log(e)} }}|\(本章完\)||[^一-ꀀ，。？！\n]{5,}（.*推荐票）|щщщ⊙тt kan⊙CΟ|第.*章.*|.*第.*章.*

bookSourceComment:
/**
    * href##$##,{"webView":true}"
     * 在js中这样使用
     * java.createSymmetricCrypto(transformation, key, iv).decrypt(data)
     * java.createSymmetricCrypto(transformation, key, iv).decryptStr(data)
     * java.createSymmetricCrypto(transformation, key, iv).encrypt(data)
     * java.createSymmetricCrypto(transformation, key, iv).encryptBase64(data)
     * java.createSymmetricCrypto(transformation, key, iv).encryptHex(data)
     */

ruleBookInfo.author: @get:{a}
ruleBookInfo.init:
@put:{
n:"[property~=book_name|title]@content",
a:"[property$=author]@content",
k:"[property~=category|status|update_time]@content",
l:"[property~=latest_chapter_name|lastest_chapter_name]@content",
i:"[property$=description]@content",
c:"[property$=image]@content",
tac:"[property$=read_url]@content",
g:"class.panel-footer@class.btn@href",
h:"p[class^=lastchapter-]@a@title||p[^lastchapter-]@a@title||.caption-bookinfo .btn-primary@textNodes"
}
ruleBookInfo.name: @get:{n}

ruleContent.nextContentUrl:
<js>
var hhekgvReg=RegExp(`\(hhekgv=|hhekgv=)+.*?([\s\S]*?).html("|');.*?`, 'g')
var hhekgv= (result.match(hhekgvReg) && result.match(hhekgvReg)[0]?result.match(hhekgvReg)[0]:"").replace(/\s+/g, '').replace(/hhekgv=|'|"|;/g,"")
if(hhekgv.includes("_")){
   result = hhekgv
}
</js>

ruleSearch.author: .s3 a@text
ruleSearch.checkKeyWord: 路明非不想当超级英雄
ruleSearch.name: .s2 a@text

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var dataArray= baseUrl.replace(".html","").split('/')
var aid = dataArray.find(n=>n.includes("bxwx_")).replace("bxwx_","")

var dataArray = []
if(baseUrl.includes(".html")){
org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result ).select(".ph_list")[1].select(".br-b-1").select("a").forEach((item)=>{
dataArray.push({
   title:org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(item).select('a').html(),
  href:org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(item).select('a').attr('href'),
})
})
}else{
 org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result ).select(".duaejh").select(".br-b-1").select("a").forEach((item)=>{
 let id=String(org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(item).select('a').attr('onclick')).replace(/read_tz|\(|\)|;/g,"")
dataArray.push({
   title:org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(item).select('a').html(),
   href: `/chapter/${aid }/${id}.html`
  })
})
}
result = dataArray
</js>
